name: Ninja Frog V0.5
description:
Ninja Frog is my first game, a 2D platformer with some fun mechanics, it has about 10 minutes of gameplay.

A/D    Walk

W     Interact

Space    Jump

If you have tips on how I should do the new levels or new mechanics please comment on the game's itch.io.

all assets came from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/pixel-adventure-1-155360
